page.title: 20Communications-Malpas
page.content:
{Findings of Malpas Church Infants}
Here are some of the things we found when we talked about{getting in touch {with people.}Another word we can use for getting touch is{communications.} Lots of us have a{television}or{ {radio.}These things are important because they tell what is happening in our world each day.{Newspapers}also give us news.Many of us have{ {telephones}in our homes too. We have made a graph to show how many of the 59 Top Infants have these things in their homes. 57 of us receive news from a newspwper 59 of us receive news from television. 58 of us have telephones at home. We also write and receive{letters. If we have to get a message to someone quickly we can send a{telegram.}
